suite.name: Order handling test

kw.name: Open New Browser Window
kw.doc: Open a new browser window

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: Login As Customer To Make An Order

kw.name: Login As Existing Customer
kw.doc: Go to shop url and login as an existing customer

kw.name: Set Local Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the local scope.

kw.name: Go To Given Page
kw.doc: Go to a given page in an already opened browser

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.doc: Check current location by url

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Click Selected Element
kw.doc: Click element indicated by locator

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Confirm No Such Element
kw.doc: Confirm element is not found

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is not found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain element '//td[@data-colname="Order"]'.

kw.name: Logout Shop Manager
kw.doc: Logout manager

kw.name: Wait Until Visible
kw.doc: Wait until element specified by locator is visible

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Hover Over Element
kw.doc: Simulate hovering over element with mouse cursor

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Visible
kw.doc: Wait until element specified by locator is visible

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Selected Element
kw.doc: Click element indicated by locator

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close All Open Browsers
kw.doc: Close all open browsers

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

suite.doc: This test will try out things from both customer and shop manager sides.
